GESTURE_CANCELED

public static final int GESTURE_CANCELED
The Constant GESTURE_CANCELED. Used when the gesture/input processing is aborted. It is not guaranteed atm that GESTURE_ENDED will be called in the future.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

GESTURE_RESUMED

public static final int GESTURE_RESUMED
The Constant GESTURE_RESUMED. Used when a gesture is resumed because it has the highest priority again for example.

See Also:
Constant Field Values
